debug.label: Debug Mode
debug.hint: Leave this disabled unless specifically asked to enable it by Illandril (otherwise, it will slow things down).

roundingMode.label: Rounding Mode
roundingMode.hint: Standard Rounding: Round down when multiclassing with other Pact caster classes, round up otherwise (the same as non-Pact Third Casters).

customPacts.name: Custom Pact Caster Progression
customPacts.label: Configure
customPacts.hint: Configure Custom Pact Caster spell progression settings. Note: Custom Pact Caster classes WILL NOT multiclass properly with other Pact Caster classes.
customPacts.title: Custom Pact Caster Progression
